programme.title: Kyle está doente e sua mãe está tentando curar ele através da sabedoria de medicina natural uma velha curandeira e seus colaboradores "nativos americanos". Enquanto isso, senhor Garrison se transforma em escritor de novelas românticas.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Kyle que ir a um concerto, mas seus pais não deixam. Cartman sugere que ele vá à polícia e diga que seus pais o molestaram, para que assim eles sejam presos.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: O primo do Kyle, que também se chama Kyle, veio de Connecticut para visitar sua mãe em South Park. Porém, apesar da mesma idade, os primos não tem nada em comum.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: A professora de arte coloca os alunos de castigo e decidem se vingar. Durante a noite, invadem sua casa e a enrolam em papel higiênico. Agora, a polícia está atrás dos responsáveis, e isso faz com que Kyle se arrependa.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Kyle diz que, como presente de aniversário, sua mãe levará ele e três amigos para a Casa Bonita. A alegria de Cartman acaba quando Kyle decide convidar Stan, Kenny e Butters. Agora Butters precisa "desaparecer".
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Após passar por uma operação para mudar de sexo, o senhor Garrison finalmente se sente como uma verdadeira mulher. Enquanto isso, Kyle quer fazer uma cirurgia para ficar negro e assim, conseguir ser aceito pelo time de basquete.
programme.desc: South Park
programme.sub-title: A Nova Vagina Chique do Professor Garrison

programme.title: Os locutores do show da baleia Jambú fazem com que as crianças acreditem que a baleia pode falar, e que ela se chama Willzyx, que está doente e morrerá se não regressar à sua casa na lua. Agora os meninos querem levar a baleia para a lua.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: O pai de Kyle compra um carro híbrido e tenta convencer todas as pessoas de que esta é a melhor opção para cuidar do planeta. Porém, ao brigar com todos em função de sua atitude esquisita, se muda para São Francisco com sua família.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Cartman acha que os ataques do dia 11 de setembro fazem parte de uma conspiração, e se dispõe para trazer a verdade à luz. Enquanto isso, o senhor Mackey apenas quer saber quem foi o infeliz que defecou no mictório.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Cartman jura que viu um duende. Ele está tão obcecado com isso, que inclusive faz uma aposta com Kyle para provar que os duendes existem. Eles encontram o duende, e agora Kyle precisa cumprir com a aposta.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: O Céu Mandou Alguém, (1948, Western)
programme.desc: Após mais um assalto, três ladrões de banco fogem rumo ao deserto. Perseguidos pelo xerife Buck Sweet, eles encontram uma mulher no meio do nada.

programme.title: O Irresistível Forasteiro, (1958, Western)
programme.desc: Um estranho em uma cidade de gado ocidental se comporta com notável autoconfiança, estabelecendo-se como um homem a ser respeitado.

programme.title: Indômita Disputa, (1979, Western)
programme.desc: Pike, Martin Sheen, é um jovem forasteiro da cidade que se vê preso e perdido em meio ao deserto oeste selvagem quando o seu amigo e caçador de peles morre.

programme.title: Jake Grandão, (2012, Western)
programme.desc: Um velho pecuarista do Texas, que já viveu o ponto alto da vida, entra em ação quando bandidos sequestram seu neto e ferem seu filho.

programme.title: Rastros de Ódio, (1956, Western)
programme.desc: O Veterano de Guerra Civil Ethan Edwards chega aos Texas em 1868 e encontra o seu irmão e a família dele.

programme.title: Por uns Dólares a Mais, (1965, Western)
programme.desc: Monco é um astuto caçador de recompensas, que perambula pelas cidades do velho oeste americano em busca de um novo alvo.

programme.title: O Dólar Furado, (1965, Western)
programme.desc: Estados Unidos, segunda metade do século 19. Gary O'Hara é um ex-capitão do Exército dos Estados Confederados.

programme.title: Viva Django!, (1968, Western)
programme.desc: Travado e cheio de chumbo, cortesia de seu ex-amigo, o político inescrupuloso e amante do dinheiro David Barry, Django se vê vagando de uma cidade empoeirada para outra trabalhando como carrasco.

programme.title: Até o Fim da Noite, (2018, Thriller)
programme.desc: Jimmy Hill é um presidiário que recebe uma proposta irrecusável. Se conseguir pagar a dívida de um velho conhecido, poderá finalmente sair da prisão.

programme.title: Infectados, (2010, Action)
programme.desc: Após perder contato com um grupo de pesquisadores em uma ilha remota, uma corporação militar contrata um grupo de cientistas para descobrir o que deu errado.

programme.title: Refúgio do Silêncio, (2016, Thriller)
programme.desc: Funcionários de uma empresa vão a um refúgio nas montanhas e descobrem o horror por trás do lugar.

programme.title: Original Gangster, (2020, Thriller)
programme.desc: Conheça a diferente vida de Castor: órfão quando criança, forçado a sobreviver no deserto, até crescer e chegar a Londres, onde se tornou um dos principais chefões do submundo do crime.

programme.title: O Muro, (2020, Drama)
programme.desc: Filmado durante 10 dias em um local ativo de travessia a 30 milhas ao norte da fronteira mexicana, O Muro é a história de uma amizade incomum entre uma imigrante sem documentos.

programme.title: O Prisioneiro, (2023, Drama)
programme.desc: Dylan deixou seu passado sombrio de crimes e encontrou o amor de sua vida, Maria. Agora ele trabalha como pescador em águas abertas, mas o diretor da prisão local tem outros planos.

programme.title: V/H/S - Viral, (2012, Horror)
programme.desc: Em busca da fama na internet, um grupo de adolescentes começa a filmar fenômenos estranhos. Mas eles não sabem que só conseguirão a atenção desejada quando forem protagonistas de acontecimentos sobrenaturais e sangrentos.

programme.title: O Semideus, (2021, Horror)
programme.desc: Um casal viaja para uma cabana isolada e descobrem a história aterrorizante do local. Não demora até que tenham que enfrentar momentos de puro horror na imensa floresta que os cerca.

programme.title: Experimentos Macabros, (2018, Horror)
programme.desc: Um homem e uma mulher acordam após uma cirurgia em um sanatório abandonado, sem nenhuma lembrança de quem são ou de como chegaram lá.

programme.title: A Maldição do Titanic, (2022, Horror)
programme.desc: 110 anos após um dos maiores desastres da história, Titanic III faz sua viagem inaugural até os destroços do navio original. Mas forças sombrias das profundezas do oceano aterrorizam os tripulantes e ameaçam repetir a história.

programme.title: Dia dos Mortos 2 - O Contágio, (2005, Horror)
programme.desc: Em 1968, os militares destroem uma instalação após a liberação de uma bactéria. Nos dias atuais, um paciente saindo de uma instituição psiquiátrica encontra um velho tubo de vácuo que, ao ser aberto, libera bactérias que transformam as pessoas em zumbis.

programme.title: O Palhaço, (2019, Horror)
programme.desc: Depois de comprar uma boneca, a vida de Lane piora quando amigos próximos e familiares começam a desaparecer.

programme.title: A Maldição do Titanic, (2022, Horror)
programme.desc: 110 anos após um dos maiores desastres da história, Titanic III faz sua viagem inaugural até os destroços do navio original. Mas forças sombrias das profundezas do oceano aterrorizam os tripulantes e ameaçam repetir a história.

programme.title: Fera Da Neve, (2011, Horror)
programme.desc: Uma equipe de pesquisa na natureza selvagem se depara com um monstro aterrorizante.

programme.title: Maldita Aranha Assassina, (2013, Action Comedies)
programme.desc: A cidade de Los Angeles tem um grande problema pela frente. Uma aranha gigante acaba de escapar de um laboratório e está aterrorizando os moradores da cidade.

programme.title: O Ataque do Tubarão de 3 Cabeças, (2015, Horror)
programme.desc: A maior máquina de matar do mundo é três vezes mais mortal quando um tubarão mutante ameaça um navio de cruzeiro. Os passageiros lutam contra o predador mortal usando tudo que podem encontrar.

programme.title: O feitiço da Casa Whaley, (2012, Horror)
programme.desc: Quando um guia de turismo invade a Casa Mais Assombrada dos Estados Unidos, um pouco de caça aos fantasmas amadores com amigos se transforma em mais horror do que eles jamais poderiam imaginar.

programme.title: Necrotério, (2006, Horror)
programme.desc: Uma brincadeira de estudantes universitários se torna mortal quando descobrem que um diretor de funerária pode ter sido libertado de um manicômio um pouco cedo demais.

programme.title: Circus Kane - O Circo dos Horrores, (2017, Horror)
programme.desc: Um grupo é convidado para um misterioso jogo em uma casa de horrores, sob a promessa de um prêmio de 250,000 dólares para aquele que sobreviver.

programme.title: Páginas da Morte, (2019, Thriller)
programme.desc: Quando um médico psiquiatra pesquisa um diário de meninas para descobrir por que ela assassinou toda a sua família, ele começa a cair no mesmo estado de insônia e confusão que a levou a perder a cabeça

programme.title: O Espelho Demoníaco rouba a energia demoníaca de Tetsusaiga. Inuyasha contra-ataca, apesar de sofrer alguns golpes ferozes, mas todos os seus ataques apontados para o Espelho Demoníaco acabam sendo tomados por Kanna.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR

programme.title: A fim de derrotar os demônios, Sango reveste Hiraikotsu com veneno. Para purificá-lo do veneno, o Mestre das Poções diz que ela deve derrotar o demônio dentro do jarro.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR
programme.sub-title: OS Sentimentos de Sango, A Decisão de Mirok

programme.title: Shishinki, o Ogre da Morte, aparece diante de Sesshomaru, dizendo a ele que Inuyasha e o pai de Sesshoumaru roubaram seu Meido Zangetsuha em uma batalha.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR

programme.title: Sesshoumaru fica furioso quando descobre o segredo por trás do Tenseiga. Totosai tenta convencer Sesshoumaru de que ele irá superar seu pai uma vez que ele seja capaz de abandonar seu apego à espada, bem como seu ódio a Inuyasha.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR

programme.title: Sesshomaru rouba o poder de Tetsusaiga com Tenseiga, fortalecido pela lembrança de Kanna, um fragmento do Mirror Demon. Inuyasha se transforma em sua forma demoníaca e tenta atacar, mas Sesshoumaru dispara seu Meido Zangetsuha.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR

programme.title: A sacerdotisa Hitomiko perdeu a vida nas mãos de Naraku. Mas ela volta à vida e tranca Kagome dentro de uma barreira. Então, o verdadeiro poder espiritual do arco do Monte Azusa se revela!
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR

programme.title: Inuyasha e Kaede tentam descobrir o que está bloqueando os poderes de Kagome.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR

programme.title: Kohaku permanece inconsciente depois de ser encarado por Magatsuhi, a vontade do mal. Kagome está preocupada, mas ela tem que se curvar e estudar para os exames de admissão, então ela decide voltar para casa.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR

programme.title: Sesshoumaru persegue a má vontade, Magatsuhi. Mas é apenas parte de uma armadilha criada por Byakuya dos Sonhos. Magatsuhi encontra Kohaku inconsciente, e ele tenta entregar seu fragmento de Shikon para Naraku.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR

programme.title: Naraku está atrás do último fragmento de Shikon e ele toma Kagome como refém.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR
programme.sub-title: O Momento da Joia Ficar Completa

programme.title: Kagome se forma no ensino médio e retorna à era feudal. Shippo e Kohaku ficam na aldeia de Kaede, enquanto o resto da gangue se dirige para a batalha de Naraku.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR

programme.title: O coração de Inuyasha é devorado pelo veneno da Jóia de Shikon, e ele se transforma em sua forma demoníaca. Ele machuca Kagome e a escuridão em seu coração toma conta dele.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR

programme.title: Os poderes espirituais de Kagome são restaurados e a luz divina é revivida na Jóia Shikon de Naraku. No entanto, Naraku usa isso como um chamariz para atrair Sango em sua armadilha.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR

programme.title: Naraku tem vivido como um demônio apesar de ter um coração humano. Enquanto lutava contra ele, Kagome pergunta sobre seu verdadeiro desejo.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR

programme.title: Naraku se dirige para o Poço do Comedor de Ossos e desaparece! Antes de desaparecer, Naraku faz seu último desejo para Kagome, ferido pelas mãos de Byakuya, ser engolido em Meido, o caminho para o submundo.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR

programme.title: Quando a última pessoa a obter a Jóia Shikon faz o único desejo correto, a jóia será purificada e desaparecerá inteiramente deste mundo.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR

programme.title: Anos após ser selado, Inuyasha, o meio-youkai é acordado por uma garota do ensino médio chamada Agome, que viajou no tempo atraves do poço Come-Ossos.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: A Garota que Volta no Tempo e o Garoto Lacrado

programme.title: Concedido o poder de controlar Inuyasha, Agome descobre que ela pode ser a reencarnação da irmã mais velha de Kaede, Kikyo, que selou Inuyasha.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: As Pessoas Atrás da Joia de Quatro Almas

programme.title: Agome e Inuyasha precisam das habilidades do outro para reunir os fragmentos dispersos da Jóia de Quatro Almas, mas os dois não se dão bem.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: A Volta Através do Poço Come-Ossos

programme.title: De volta ao presente, Agome está relaxando em casa quando Inuyasha vem procurá-la, e ela retorna com ele ao passado para encontrar Yura.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: O meio irmão de Inuyasha, Sesshomaru, aparece procurando pelo túmulo de seu pai que era um youkai-cachorro. Agome aprende sobre o passado de Inuyasha.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Apesar da ajuda de Agome em frustrá-lo, Sesshomaru descobre a localização do túmulo do pai de Inuyasha, que contém uma espada que ele deseja.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: Tessaiga, O Canino de Aço Destruidor

programme.title: Agome é capaz de puxar a espada Tessaiga para fora do altar, e Sesshomaru tenta matá-la, irritando Inuyasha e provocando um duelo de irmãos.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Inuyasha e Agome encontram um jovem samurai chamado Nobunaga cujo senhor foi possuído por um youkai Sapo, e eles partiram para resgatar uma princesa.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: O Senhor Feudal Youkai, Sapo Tsukumo

programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: Entra em Cena Shippo! Os Irmãos Youkai Relâmpago

programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: Confrontro Fantasma: Irmãos Relâmpago vs. Tessaiga

programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: Tatarimokke e o Pequeno Espítiro Mau

programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: O Segredo do Primeiro Dia: O Inuyasha de Cabelos Pretos

programme.title: Inuyasha e os outros encontram a Feiticeira Urasue, que rouba o túmulo de Kikyo, a sacerdotisa que selou Inuyasha. Ele está determinado a impedi-lá.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: O Roubo dos Ossos Sagrados da Kikyo

programme.title: Para trazer Kikyo de volta à vida, Urasue sequestra Agome. Quando Kikyo é revivida, ela imediatamente tenta matar Inuyasha com raiva.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Mirok, um jovem monge mulherengo, coleciona fragmentos da Jóia de Quatro Almas. Quando ele rouba a de Agome, Inuyasha o segue para recuperá-los.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: O Buraco do Vento na Mão Direita: Mirok, O Monge Delinquente

programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: A Tinta Corrompida do Pintor do Inferno

programme.sub-title: Iggy, o louco, e N'Doul, o deus Geb – Parte 2

programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Para proteger a cidade, Jotaro quer destruir o misterioso arco e flecha que despertou o poder do Stand de Angelo.

programme.title: Para tentar salvar Koichi, Josuke vai à casa de Okuyasu Nijimura, mas é atacado por seu irmão, Keicho. Josuke propõe um acordo a Okuyasu, que está ferido.

programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: A caminho da escola de bicicleta, Koichi atropela um gato dentro de um saco. Um homem vê o acidente e chantageia Koichi, exigindo que ele pague pelo enterro do animal.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Josuke e Koichi tentam descobrir se o colega de escola Toshikazu Hazamada está mesmo usando um Stand e encontram um boneco de madeira no armário dele.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: A colega de escola Yukako Yamagishi confessa seu amor por Koichi. Ele fica muito feliz, mas ela acaba indo longe demais.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Koichi tenta fugir, mas é impedido por Yukako e perde a esperança. Quando ela vai até um telefone público, algo inesperado acontece.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Josuke e Okuyasu vão a um novo restaurante italiano que é meio esquisito. Okuyasu acha a água deliciosa, mas seu corpo tem uma reação estranha.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: A Bruxa do Cabelo Branco do Reino Lunar, (2014, Action)
programme.desc: História de dois amantes, a bruxa de cabelos brancos e o líder taoísta Zhuo Yihang e seu amor que pode mudar o destino da nação.

programme.title: Ragnarok, (2013, Fantasy)
programme.desc: Um arqueólogo fica obcecado pelos escritos encontrados em um navio viking, que podem solucionar o mistério de Ragnarok Porém, durante suas buscas, ele acaba despertando acidentalmente um monstro gigantesco.

programme.title: Jack Hunter, (2008, Adventure)
programme.desc: O jovem arqueólogo Jack Hunter planejou apenas tirar uma foto de uma tabuinha cuneiforme da outrora insuperável metrópole mesopotmiana Ugarit, na atual Síria, mas é pego e tem que roubá-la de um museu particular na França.

programme.title: As Crônicas de Spiderwick, (2008, Adventure)
programme.desc: Esta aventura de fantasia é adaptada da série de livros campeã de vendas, que revela um mundo nunca visto que existe ao nosso redor.

programme.title: Fora do Rumo, (2016, Action Comedies)
programme.desc: Um detetive de Hong Kong se une a um jogador americano para lutar contra um notório criminoso chinês.

programme.title: As Tartarugas Ninja 3, (1991, Adventure)
programme.desc: Um cetro mágico leva April para o Japão antigo. As Tartarugas Ninja viajam no tempo para salvá-la, mas Michelangelo se perde. Donatello, Raphael e Leonardo ajudam uma vila contra o malvado Lorde Norinaga.

programme.title: Assassin's Creed, (2016, Action)
programme.desc: Callum Lynch explora as memórias de seu ancestral Aguilar Nerha e se torna um Mestre Assassino para enfrentar a sociedade secreta dos Templários.

programme.title: O Retorno do Dragão - A Cidade Perdida, (2012, Adventure)

programme.title: Ricardo Coração de Leão, (2014, Adventure)

programme.title: Retroceder Nunca, Render-se Jamais, (1986, Action)
programme.desc: Jason Stillwell é um fã de Bruce Lee e jovem aprendiz de artes marciais. Após seu pai negar participar de uma gangue de criminosos, eles se mudam de cidade, onde Jason encontrará problemas.

programme.title: Honra, (2006, Action)
programme.desc: Dois amigos do mesmo bairro que seguiram caminhos diferentes devem decidir se ficarão do lado da lei ou das gangues quando novos confrontos começarem.

programme.title: Dragões para Sempre, (1988, Action)
programme.desc: Jackie é contratado para defender uma empresa acusada de poluir as águas da cidade. Ao descobrir que eles produzem drogas, Jackie decide mudar de lado.​

programme.title: Karatê Girl, (2009, Action)
programme.desc: Uma estudante do ensino médio no Japão que é uma estudante de karatê arrogante, mas magistral, torna-se feroz quando se junta a uma equipe disfarçada de lutadores.

programme.title: Police Story 2 - Codinome: Radical, (1988, Action)
programme.desc: Os métodos incomuns de um policial de Hong Kong levam ao seu rebaixamento para o trânsito, apesar do sucesso. Enquanto isso, um antigo inimigo sai da prisão em busca de vingança.

programme.title: Ip Man - O Mestre do Kung Fu, (2020, Action)
programme.desc: Durante o tempo em que foi capitão da polícia na cidade de Foshan, Ip Man é perseguido por um gângster vingativo, enquanto o exército japonês invade a região.

programme.title: Kickboxer: A Retaliação, (2018, Action)
programme.desc: Kurt Sloan prometeu a si mesmo que não voltaria para a Tailândia, mas alguém o seda e o força a retornar ao país asiático.

programme.title: O Matador - Missão Resgate, (2022, Action)
programme.desc: Quando a garota de quem ele está cuidando é sequestrada, um assassino aposentado rapidamente recupera seus instintos assassinos, incendiando a cidade.

programme.title: O Monge à Prova de Balas, (2020, Action Comedies)
programme.desc: Baseado em uma história em quadrinhos "underground", ele conta a história de um monge tibetano imortal -Chow- que se torna o mentor de um jovem menino de rua -Scott-, a quem ele ensina a proteger um velho pergaminho que o monge cuidou durante anos.

programme.title: The Children's Hour: The Children's Hour, (1962, Drama)
programme.desc: In this provocatively daring film, an attention-seeking schoolgirl vengefully spreads rumors that her teachers (Audrey Hepburn and Shirley MacLaine) are lesbians.

programme.title: Blithe Spirit, (1945, Best of British Humor)
programme.desc: A man and his second wife are haunted by the ghost of his first wife.

programme.title: Brief Encounter, (1945, Drama)
programme.desc: Meeting a stranger in a railway station, a woman is tempted to cheat on her husband.

programme.title: Hatari, (1962, Comedy)
programme.desc: Director Howard Hawks reteams with John Wayne, who heads a group of highly skilled professional game hunters in Africa. Only they don’t use bullets – they capture the ferocious big game with strong rope and cameras for zoos and circus attractions.

programme.title: Donovan's Reef, (1963, Comedy)
programme.desc: Acclaimed director John Ford and screen legend John Wayne team up for what would be their final collaboration in this boisterous, rowdy South Seas escapade.

programme.title: The Great Escape, (1963, War)
programme.desc: Steve McQueen, James Garner, and Richard Attenborough headline a stellar cast in one of the most ingenious and suspenseful adventure films of all time as a team of Allied soldiers mount a daring escape from an inescapable Nazi POW camp.

programme.title: Father Goose, (1964, Political Comedies)
programme.desc: Cary Grant stars in one of his funniest roles as a boozy beachcomber sitting out WWII in peace - until the Allies recruit him to be a lookout on the South Pacific isle.

programme.title: The African Queen, (1951, Adventure)
programme.desc: A timeless tale of two mismatched strangers joining forces in a common cause - and finding love along the way. The story chronicles the burgeoning romance as they reluctantly join forces to torpedo a German gunboat in war-torn East Africa.

programme.title: We Were Soldiers, (2002, Military & War Action)
programme.desc: In 1965, America is at war with North Vietnam and Lt. Col. Hal Moore prepares his troops for one of the most violent battles in U.S. History: “The Valley of Death”.

programme.title: Assault On Va-33, (2021, Action)
programme.desc: Sean Patrick Flanery (The Boondock Saints) stars as Army Veteran Jason Hill. While on a VA hospital visit, terrorists infiltrate the building and take hostages. Hill is now outnumbered and the last line of defense against the armed insurgents.

programme.title: We Were Soldiers, (2002, Military & War Action)
programme.desc: In 1965, America is at war with North Vietnam and Lt. Col. Hal Moore prepares his troops for one of the most violent battles in U.S. History: “The Valley of Death”.

programme.title: One More Shot, (2024, Action)
programme.desc: A Navy SEAL fights off airport terrorists planning to bomb the State of the Union address.

programme.title: Vantage Point, (2008, Thriller)
programme.desc: During an historic counter-terrorism summit in Spain, the President of the United States is struck down by an assassin's bullet. Eight strangers have a perfect view of the kill, but what did they really see? Rated: PG-13

programme.title: Escape Plan, (2012, Action)
programme.desc: Sylvester Stallone, Arnold Schwarzenegger, and 50 Cent star as inmates who must break out of a top secret, high-security prison in this non-stop action-thriller.

programme.title: The Expendables, (2010, Action)
programme.desc: A tight-knit team of skilled combat vets turned mercenaries, set out to save the innocent and punish the guilty in this blistering action-packed thriller.

programme.title: The Expendables 2, (2012, Action)
programme.desc: Barney and his mercenaries race to stop five tons of weapons-grade plutonium from falling into the wrong hands in this all-star, action-packed sequel.

programme.title: The Expendables 3, (2014, Action)
programme.desc: Sylvester Stallone stars in this explosive thrill-ride. When The Expendables face an old rival, it's a clash of old-school versus high-tech in the most personal battle yet.

programme.title: Friday the 13th Part - IV: The Final Chapter, (1984, Horror)
programme.desc: After his revival in a hospital morgue, the hockey-masked murderer fixes his vengeful attention on the Jarvis family and a group of hitherto carefree teenagers.

programme.title: Friday the 13th Part V: A New Beginning, (1985, Horror)
programme.desc: This time he seems to have set his sights on the young patients at a secluded halfway house. And more than a few of his teen targets end up in half, in quarters... you name it, Jason does it.

programme.title: Friday the 13th, Part VI: Jason Lives, (1986, Horror)
programme.desc: As a child, Tommy Jarvis did what many others died trying to do. He killed Jason Vorhees, the mass murderer who terrorized the residents of Crystal Lake. But now, years later, Tommy is tormented by the fear that maybe Jason isn’t really dead.

programme.title: Friday the 13th Part VII: The New Blood, (1988, Horror)
programme.desc: Ever since homicidal maniac Jason Voorhees got trapped in chains at the bottom of Crystal Lake, the nearby summer camp has operated without a hitch... without a murder. But one of this season’s happy campers has brought along a deadly secret.

programme.title: The Woods, (2006, Drama)
programme.desc: A teenager is dropped off at a remote all-girls school deep in the forest. As her classmates start to disappear, the teenager begins to suspect that things are not what they appear to be at the school and that there is something in the forest.

programme.title: The Town That Dreaded Sundown, (2014, Thriller)
programme.desc: 65 years after a masked serial killer terrorized the small town of Texarkana, the "moonlight murders" begin again. A lonely high school girl, with dark secrets of her own, may be the key to catching him.

programme.title: 30 Days of Night, (2007, Horror)
programme.desc: Josh Hartnett (The Black Dahlia, Pearl Harbor) crosses over to the dark side in this bone-chilling adaptation of the cult-hit graphic novel, brought to the screen in all its demonic glory.

programme.title: 30 Days of Night: Dark Days, (2010, Horror)
programme.desc: Almost a year has passed since Barrow, Alaska’s population was decimated by vampires. Stella, mourning her husband’s murder, has been travelling the world trying to convince others that vampires exist.

programme.title: 28 Days Later, (2002, Horror)
programme.desc: Animal rights activists free a group of infected chimps to horrifying results. 28 days later, Jim wakes from a coma and explores a deserted London. He soon learns the truth behind the deserted streets and the menacing creatures that lurk in the shadows.

programme.title: Overlord, (2018, Military & War Action)
programme.desc: Nothing can prepare you for the mind-blowing mayhem that is Overlord. Mega producer J.J. Abrams creates an insanely twisted thrill ride about a team of American troops who come face-to-face with Nazi super-soldiers unlike the world has ever seen.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Hol Horse and Mondatta, Part 2
programme.desc: Following Mondatta's prediction, Hol Horse sticks his fingers into Polnareff's nose, but he doesn't know what to do from there. Making matters worse, Jotaro and the others show up in search of Polnareff, forcing Hol Horse into a tough spot.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: The Guardian of Hell, Pet Shop, Part 1
programme.desc: Jotaro and his friends continue to search for DIO's mansion in Cairo. Following Avdol's advice, they have a beggar look for the mansion and wait. Meanwhile, Iggy, wandering the city alone, is confronted by two large dogs.
programme.sub-title: The Guardian of Hell, Pet Shop, Part 1

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: The Guardian of Hell, Pet Shop, Part 2
programme.desc: Iggy ends up in a battle to the death in the sewers against Pet Shop, the falcon that guards DIO's mansion. Despite being injured, Iggy runs to the river in an attempt to escape, but he may have underestimated Pet Shop's abilities.
programme.sub-title: The Guardian of Hell, Pet Shop, Part 2

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: D'Arby the Player, Part 1
programme.desc: Though purchased dearly with Iggy's injury, Jotaro and his group finally have the location of DIO's palace. Waiting for them where they find the butler, Darby Younger, brother of the gambler they previously defeated.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: D'Arby the Player, Part 2
programme.desc: The battle for souls with D'Arby continues. Kakyoin challenges D'Arby to a racing game but ends up losing both the race and his soul. Before Joseph really has time to react, Jotaro picks the next game.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: The Miasma of the Void, Cool Ice, Part 1
programme.desc: The baseball game with D'Arby continues within DIO's mansion. For some reason, Jotaro starts telling D'Arby what pitches he'll be throwing. D'Arby finds Jotaro's actions strange, but still believes he has the upper hand because of his Stand's abilities.
programme.sub-title: The Miasma of the Void, Cool Ice, Part 1

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: The Miasma of the Void, Cool Ice, Part 2
programme.desc: After a long, hard journey, the group is suddenly faced with saying goodbye to a friend. Polnareff can't control his emotions and starts brandishing his sword toward an unseen enemy with very little success.
programme.sub-title: The Miasma of the Void, Cool Ice, Part 2

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Gon tries to bond with a Chimera Ant called Meleoron, even though it's risky for a Nen user to reveal his abilities.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: The King is killing time as he awaits the selection. He calls upon masters of shogi and go and defeats every one of them.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Knov is making his way to the palace. The Chimera Ants Leol and Flutter follow him to try to determine his abilities, but they lose sight of him.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: The King is annoyed and confounded after meeting Komugi, the unfathomable Gungi world champion. But at the same time, he is having fun.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Knov infiltrates the palace. His goal is to place the exits for his ability, the Fourth Dimensional Mansion.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter

programme.sub-title: Taking Stock x And x Taking Action

programme.title: Death Note: Love

programme.desc:
Kate accepts a lucrative opportunity to lead a thrill-seeking millionaire businessman on a shark dive in the most dangerous waters, outside the cage.
PG-13

programme.title: Hoodlum, (1997, Action)
programme.desc: 1930's New York. The black community of Harlem faces the same indignities as countless millions of refugees. If the seeds of Harlem's urban power would not grow in the White city, the Black underground would form to take control.

programme.title: Proud Mary, (2018, Thriller)
programme.desc: Taraji P. Henson is Mary, a hit woman working for an organized crime family in Boston, whose life is completely turned around when she meets a young boy whose path she crosses when a professional hit goes bad.

programme.title: The Art of War, (2000, Action)
programme.desc: UN's secretary general uses covert operations to help diplomacy along. Shaw's called back 6 months after one such operation. He witnesses the murder of Chinese UN ambassador at UN, NYC, chases the assassin and ends up a suspect.

programme.title: The Art of War II: Betrayal, (2008, Espionage Action)
programme.desc: Agent Neil Shaw returns in the no holds barred action adventure sequel. When Shaw is called out of retirement as a Hollywood film consultant by the murder of his long-time martial arts mentor, 'Mother.'

programme.title: The Art of War III: Retribution, (2007, Espionage Action)
programme.desc: When international diplomacy comes up short, extreme measures must be taken. In the newest installment of Art of War, Agent Neil Shaw is on a covert mission to stop North Korean terrorists from obtaining a nuclear bomb.

programme.title: Proud Mary, (2018, Thriller)
programme.desc: Taraji P. Henson is Mary, a hit woman working for an organized crime family in Boston, whose life is completely turned around when she meets a young boy whose path she crosses when a professional hit goes bad.

programme.title: Get Rich or Die Tryin', (2005, Musical)
programme.desc: Following a near-fatal gun battle, Marcus recalls his journey from orphaned street kid from the Bronx to making his mark in the drug trade to teaming up with a fellow ex-con (Terrence Howard) for his shot at becoming a successful rap artist.

programme.title: Juice, (1992, Thriller)
programme.desc: Q. Raheem. Bishop. Steel. They're four Harlem friends who spend their days hanging out and looking for a way to get the power and respect they call Juice. Q hopes to earn respect by becoming a scratch 'n' mix DJ.

programme.title: Reign Of Assassins, (2010, Action)
programme.desc: Elusive assassin Drizzle transforms herself into modest shop owner Zeng Jing (Michelle Yeoh) in order to transport the remains of an exalted Buddhist monk to their eternal resting place, but finds her mission unexpectedly complicated.

programme.title: Tai Chi Master [Cantonese-Language Version], (1993, Action)
programme.desc: Two friends, ex Shaolin monks, part ways as they brush with the ongoing rebellion against the government. The ambitious one rises up to be a powerful military commander, while his betrayed friend resorts to learn the calm ways of Tai Chi.

programme.title: Master Z: Ip Man Legacy, (2018, Action)
programme.desc: Legendary action director Yuen Woo Ping draws on a stellar cast (Michelle Yeoh, Dave Bautista, Tony Jaa, and Max Zhang) to create a hard-hitting martial arts blast worthy of its place in the celebrated IP MAN universe.

programme.title: Reign Of Assassins, (2010, Action)
programme.desc: Elusive assassin Drizzle transforms herself into modest shop owner Zeng Jing (Michelle Yeoh) in order to transport the remains of an exalted Buddhist monk to their eternal resting place, but finds her mission unexpectedly complicated.

programme.title: Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon, (2000, Action)
programme.desc: An epic set against the breathtaking landscapes of ancient China, Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon combines the exhilarating martial arts choreography by Yuen Wo-Ping with the sensitivity and classical storytelling of an Ang Lee film.

programme.title: The Grandmaster, (2013, Action)
programme.desc: From director Wong Kar Wai and starring Tony Leung and Ziyi Yang, THE GRANDMASTER is an epic action film inspired by the life of Ip Man, the legendary kung fu master who trained Bruce Lee.

programme.title: Preman: Silent Fury, (2022, Action)
programme.desc: After his son witnesses a brutal murder by a notorious crime boss, a deaf Indonesian gangster is thrust into the fight of his life when he takes on his dangerous former allies—including a sociopathic assassin—in order to protect his child.

programme.title: The Raid: Redemption, (2012, Action)
programme.desc: Deep in the heart of Jakarta's slums lies a drug-gang’s safe house, home to some of the most terrifying and ruthless fighters in the city. Arriving before dawn, an elite swat team moves in to take down the notorious drug lord that runs it.

programme.title: The Raid 2 (Subtitled), (2014, Action)
programme.desc: Following immediately after the events of THE RAID, Rama (Iko Uwais) is forced to reinvent himself as an undercover cop in order to provide protection for his wife and child.

programme.title: Little Nicky, (2000, Screwball)
programme.desc: When Satan reneges on his plans to retire, two of his three heirs leave Hell to gather enough souls to vote the Prince of Darkness out of office. But Satan sends his youngest—and nicest—son, Little Nicky, to bring the other two home.

programme.title: Grown Ups, (2010, Screwball)
programme.desc: Five high school pals reunite after 30 years at a July 4th celebration and wrestle with the challenges of adulthood.

programme.title: Grown Ups 2, (2013, Screwball)
programme.desc: After moving his family back to his hometown to be with his friends and their kids, Lenny (Adam Sandler) finds out that between old bullies, new bullies, wild bus drivers, cops on skis and 400 costumed party crashers, sometimes crazy follows you.

programme.title: Playing with Fire, (2019, Screwball)
programme.desc: When firefighter Jake Carson (John Cena) and his team (Keegan-Michael Key & John Leguizamo) rescue three siblings in the path of a wildfire, they realize no amount of training could have prepared them for their most challenging job yet -- babysitting.

programme.title: Easy A, (2010, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: After a little white lie about losing her virginity gets out, a clean cut high school girl (Emma Stone) sees her reputation tarnished until she decides to use the rumor mill to advance her social and financial standing.

programme.title: Hitch, (2004, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: Meet Hitch, New York City's greatest matchmaker. Love is his job and he'll get you the girl of your dreams in just three easy dates, guaranteed!

programme.title: Playing with Fire, (2019, Screwball)
programme.desc: When firefighter Jake Carson (John Cena) and his team (Keegan-Michael Key & John Leguizamo) rescue three siblings in the path of a wildfire, they realize no amount of training could have prepared them for their most challenging job yet -- babysitting.

programme.title: Blankman, (1994, Comedy)
programme.desc: In Living Color's favorite team of Damon Wayans and David Alan Grier joins Robin Givens, Jon Polito and Jason Alexander in this hilarious crime-fighting comedy about two slapstick heroes who triumph over evil... more or less. Rated PG-13

programme.title: The Green Hornet, (2011, Action Comedies)
programme.desc: Britt Reid is a slacker by day, party animal by night... until he finds a serious career that's seriously cool: crime-fighting action hero. As the Green Hornet, he teams up with gadget wiz and martial arts master Kato to take down LA's underworld.

programme.title: The Twilight Saga: Breaking Dawn - Part 1, (2011, Drama)
programme.desc: Bella and Edward find their lives in turmoil after discovering she is pregnant. It's not long before her health is suffering, while meanwhile the wolf pack suspect the child could be their downfall.

programme.title: Twilight Saga: Breaking Dawn Part 2, (2012, Drama)
programme.desc: The birth of Bella and Edward’s child ignites forces that threaten to destroy them all as tensions build toward all-out war between the Cullens and the Volturi in the thrilling conclusion to the epic phenomenon.

programme.title: Rent, (2005, Musical)
programme.desc: Based on Jonathan Larson's Bohemian rock musical, Rent tells the story of a group of social outcasts struggling to live in the moment yet survive the realities of New York's gritty East Village.

programme.title: Fame, (2009, Comedy)
programme.desc: Fame follows a talented group of dancers, singers, actors and artists over four years at the New York City High School of Performance Arts.

programme.title: The House Bunny, (2008, Screwball)
programme.desc: When Shelley gets kicked out of the mansion, she's lost in the wilds of Beverly Hills until she stumbles upon the sorriest sorority on campus. Now it's up to her to spruce up the girls and heat up the Zeta house before the University shuts them down.

programme.desc: THE BROTHERS is a fresh and hilarious look at four African-American "brothers" lifelong friends who band together to navigate through the turbulent waters of love and sex on their way to healthy, happy and committed relationships. Rated R

programme.title: Philadelphia, (1993, Drama)
programme.desc: Hailed as a landmark film that dazzles with deep emotion and exceptional acting, PHILADELPHIA stars Tom Hanks and Denzel Washington as two competing lawyers who join forces to sue a prestigious law firm for AIDS discrimination. Rating: PG-13

programme.title: Chef, (2014, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: Chef quits his job in LA after refusing to compromise with its owner, he is left to figure out what's next. He teams up with his ex, a friend & his son to launch a food truck reigniting his passion for the kitchen and zest for life.

programme.title: Forrest Gump, (1994, Drama)
programme.desc: Tom Hanks gives an astonishing performance as Forrest, an everyman whose simple innocence comes to embody a generation.

programme.title: Savage State, (2021, Western)
programme.desc: When the American Civil War breaks out, a family of french settlers must abandon their Missouri home.

programme.title: The Conspirator, (2010, Drama)
programme.desc: From director Robert Redford comes the riveting true story behind the assassination trial of Abraham Lincoln – including the lone woman who was accused of plotting his murder.

programme.title: Sanctified, (2022, Western)
programme.desc: A thrilling Western set in 1890 North Dakota, 'Sanctified' is the tale of an outlaw rescued from death by a nun traveling the Badlands. A deep friendship develops as she nurses the man back to health in exchange for his guidance at a local church.

programme.title: Meek's Cutoff, (2011, Western)
programme.desc: Settlers traveling through the Oregon desert in 1845 find themselves stranded in harsh conditions.

programme.title: First Cow, (2019, Drama)
programme.desc: Two travelers, on the run from a band of vengeful hunters in the 1820s Northwest, dream of striking it rich—but their tenuous plan to make their fortune on the frontier comes to rely on the secret use of a landowner's prized dairy cow.

programme.title: Slow West, (2015, Western)
programme.desc: A bounty hunter (Michael Fassbender) keeps his true motive a secret from the naïve Scottish teenager (Kodi Smit-McPhee) he's offered to serve as bodyguard and guide while the youth searches for his beloved in 1800s Colorado.

programme.title: True Grit, (2010, Drama)
programme.desc: True Grit is a powerful story of vengeance and valor set in an unforgiving and unpredictable frontier where justice is simple and mercy is rare.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade, (1989, Adventure)
programme.desc: There's nothing more exciting than trying to keep up with the Joneses in Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade. Indy's Nazi enemies are back and have kidnapped his father, in their effort to locate the sacred Holy Grail.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Kingdom of the Crystal Skull, (2008, Adventure)
programme.desc: STEVEN SPIELBERG and GEORGE LUCAS bring you the greatest adventurer of all time! Indiana Jones and the Kingdom of the Crystal Skull finds Indy trying to outrace a brilliant and beautiful agent for the mystical, all-powerful crystal skull of Akator.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Raiders of the Lost Ark, (1981, Adventure)
programme.desc: Get ready for thrills in Indiana Jones and the Raiders of the Lost Ark. Indy and his ex-flame Marion Ravenwood dodge booby-traps, fight Nazis, and stare down snakes in their incredible worldwide quest for the mystical Ark of the Covenant.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom, (1984, Adventure)
programme.desc: Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom brings you thrills and excitement. Indy, his sidekick Short Round and nightclub singer Willie Scott go from high-flying action above the Himalayas to a spine-tingling escape from a fortress-like mine in India.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade, (1989, Adventure)
programme.desc: There's nothing more exciting than trying to keep up with the Joneses in Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade. Indy's Nazi enemies are back and have kidnapped his father, in their effort to locate the sacred Holy Grail.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Kingdom of the Crystal Skull, (2008, Adventure)
programme.desc: STEVEN SPIELBERG and GEORGE LUCAS bring you the greatest adventurer of all time! Indiana Jones and the Kingdom of the Crystal Skull finds Indy trying to outrace a brilliant and beautiful agent for the mystical, all-powerful crystal skull of Akator.

programme.title: Coraline, (2009, Fantasy)
programme.desc: Coraline Jones discovers a secret world that's like her own, but better! When her Other Mother tries to keep her, Coraline must be brave to get home.

programme.title: The Boxtrolls, (2014, Fantasy)
programme.desc: When evil Archibald Snatcher decides to capture the Boxtrolls – lovable, box-wearing creatures – it’s up to Eggs and his friend Winnie to same them.

programme.title: Rough Night, (2017, Comedy)
programme.desc: Five best friends from college reunite ten years later for a wild weekend getaway in Miami. Their outrageous antics and hard partying result in hilarious unexpected consequences which land them in a seemingly impossible situation to escape.

programme.title: American Hustle, (2013, Drama)
programme.desc: The con is on when scam artists and lovers Irving Rosenfeld and Sydney Prosser are entrapped by ambitious FBI agent Richie DiMaso and coerced into participating in a sting operation that hinges on snaring politician Carmine Polito and his associates.

programme.title: The 4:30 Movie, (2024, Comedy)
programme.desc: In Kevin Smith's most personal film to date, a teenage cinephile tries to woo the girl of his dreams while dealing with a hilarious mix of friends and enemies at his local cinema.

programme.title: Charlie's Angels, (2000, Action)
programme.desc: When a devious mastermind embroils them in a plot to destroy individual privacy, the Angels, aided by their loyal sidekick Bosley (Bill Murray), set out to bring down the bad guys.

programme.title: Charlie's Angels: Full Throttle, (2003, Action)
programme.desc: The "Angels", three investigative agents (Barrymore, Diaz and Liu) who work for the Charles Townsend Detective Agency, return for another high-octane series of adventures as they investigate the theft of a database of witness protection profiles.

programme.title: Step Brothers, (2008, Screwball)
programme.desc: Will Ferrell and John C. Reilly star as two aimless middle-aged losers who are forced to become roommates after their parents get married.

programme.title: Rush Hour, (1998, Action Comedies)
programme.desc: The fastest hands in the East meet the biggest mouth in the West when legendary martial arts daredevil Jackie Chan teams with comedic powerhouse Chris Tucker in Rush Hour.

programme.title: Rush Hour 2, (2001, Action Comedies)
programme.desc: While vacationing together in Hong Kong, fast-talking LAPD Detective Carter and Hong Kong Police Inspector Lee investigate when a bomb explodes in the American embassy.

programme.title: Rush Hour 3, (2007, Action Comedies)
programme.desc: Set in Paris, Rush Hour 3 finds Chris Tucker and Jackie Chan's misfit partners from West and East battling a wing of the Chinese organized crime family of the Triads -- with their trademark mix of great action and big laughs.

programme.title: Crystal Fairy, (2013, Comedy)
programme.desc: Michael Cera stars in a hilarious comedy about an obnoxious American and a girl named Crystal Fairy (Gaby Hoffman) who take a hallucinogen on a trip through Chile.

programme.title: Clerks, (1994, Comedy)
programme.desc: The legendary indie film that launched the career of Kevin Smith and won over audiences with its raw energy, outrageous comedy, and a hip soundtrack. CLERKS features razor-sharp wit and the debut of pop-culture icons Jay and Silent Bob.

programme.title: Clerks II, (2006, Screwball)
programme.desc: A calamity at Dante and Randall's shops sends them looking for new horizons, but they ultimately settle at Mooby's, a fictional Disney-McDonald's-style fast-food empire. Sequel to the 1994 film by Kevin Smith.

programme.title: Clerks III, (2022, Screwball)
programme.desc: Following a massive heart attack, Randal enlists his friends and fellow clerks Dante, Elias, Jay, and Silent Bob to make a movie immortalizing his life at the convenience store that started it all.

programme.title: 24 Hour Party People, (2002, Comedy)
programme.desc: Graphically depicting the music and dance heritage of Manchester from the late 70s to the early 90s, the movie documents the vibrancy that made Manchester the place in the world that you would most like to be.

programme.title: Clerks, (1994, Comedy)
programme.desc: The legendary indie film that launched the career of Kevin Smith and won over audiences with its raw energy, outrageous comedy, and a hip soundtrack. CLERKS features razor-sharp wit and the debut of pop-culture icons Jay and Silent Bob.

programme.title: Wild Things, (1998, Thriller)

programme.title: Succubus, (2024, Horror)

programme.title: Ginger Snaps, (2001, Horror)
programme.desc: The Craft meets The Howling in this edgy, modern werewolf tale in which a teenage girl must choose between saving herself and joining her sister in an otherworldly existence.

programme.title: Scream, (1996, Horror)
programme.desc: After a series of mysterious deaths, an offbeat group of scary movie fans become the target of a masked killer in this smash-hit thriller from legendary director Wes Craven (A NIGHTMARE ON ELM STREET) that breathed new life into the horror genre.

programme.title: Scream 2, (1997, Horror)
programme.desc: While away at college, Sidney Prescott thought she'd finally put the terror behind her...until a copycat killer begins acting out a real-life sequel in which no one is safe, or beyond suspicion.

programme.title: Scream 3, (2000, Horror)
programme.desc: The first film set the rules. In the sequel, the stakes got higher. In the third installment of the hit franchise SCREAM, all bets are off. It's an insidious game of horror movie mayhem with surprising twists and turns.

programme.title: Urban Legend, (1998, Horror)
programme.desc: When New England college student Natalie finds herself at the center of a series of sadistic murders seemingly inspired by urban legends, she resolves to find the truth about Pendleton's own legend. Rated: R

programme.desc: In the remote desert of New Mexico, “The Manhattan Project” is materializing – the World War II effort to build the atomic bomb.

programme.title: Dragged Across Concrete, (2019, Thriller)
programme.desc: Two embittered police detectives (Mel Gibson and Vince Vaughn) descend into the criminal underworld and find more than they wanted waiting in the shadows.

programme.title: Fresh, (1994, Action)
programme.desc: Disenchanted by the harsh realities of life in the city, a smart, streetwise kid named Fresh strives to create a better future for himself and his family. He defies the odds by staying one move ahead of the criminals in a dangerous game of survival.

programme.title: Reindeer Games, (2000, Thriller)
programme.desc: Just one week before Christmas, after serving six years in jail, an ex-con is forced to take part in a deadly casino heist. Ben Affleck, Charlize Theron, and Gary Sinise star in this action-packed crime thriller from director John Frankenheimer.

programme.title: Once Upon a Time in Mexico, (2003, Action)
programme.desc: A drug lord who pretends to overthrow the Mexican government. A corrupt FBI agent (Johnny Depp) who at that time, demands retribution from his worst enemy to carry out the drug lord's uprising against the government.

programme.title: Donnie Brasco, (1997, Drama)
programme.desc: Posing as jewel broker Donnie Brasco, FBI agent Joseph D. Pistone (Johnny Depp) is granted entrance into the violent mob family of aging hit man Lefty Ruggiero (Al Pacino).

programme.title: Fresh, (1994, Action)
programme.desc: Disenchanted by the harsh realities of life in the city, a smart, streetwise kid named Fresh strives to create a better future for himself and his family. He defies the odds by staying one move ahead of the criminals in a dangerous game of survival.

programme.title: Drive, (2011, Thriller)
programme.desc: A Hollywood stunt performer (Ryan Gosling) who moonlights as a wheelman discovers that a contract has been put on him after a heist gone wrong.

programme.title: Bullet In The Head, (1990, Foreign Action & Adventure)
programme.desc: When three close friends escape from Hong Kong to war-time Saigon to start a criminal's life, they all go through a harrowing experience which totally shatters their lives and their friendship forever.

programme.title: Red Cliff, (2015, Foreign Action & Adventure)
programme.desc: Legendary action cinema master John Woo and international superstar Tony Leung reunite for the first time since the 1992 classic HARD BOILED with this epic historical drama based on a legendary 208 A.D. battle that heralded the Han Dynasty's end.

programme.title: Face/Off, (1997, Action)
programme.desc: As a result of a new medical technique, an agent is able to surgically take on the identical appearance of a criminal in order to take down his terrorist organization.

programme.title: Paycheck, (2003, Action)
programme.desc: Michael Jennings works on top-secret projects. After each job, his memory is erased. After his latest assignment, he is shocked to be told that he agreed to forfeit all payment, until he receives an envelope containing clues to his forgotten past.

programme.title: Windtalkers, (2002, Drama)
programme.desc: True story about members of the Navajo tribe who proudly served the U.S. in WW II as code talkers by using their native language as a code to relay information to military leaders.

programme.title: Vertical Limit, (2000, Action)
programme.desc: An emotionally-charged action-adventure tale of a retired climber (O'Donnell) who must launch a treacherous and extraordinary rescue effort up K2, the world's second-highest peak, to save his estranged sister and her summit team in a race against time.

programme.title: Cold Pursuit, (2019, Action)
programme.desc: Liam Neeson returns to form in a new darkly comedic thrill ride. (ABC-TV)

programme.title: Go, (1999, Screwball)
programme.desc: Ronna needs to make some extra cash. Simon wants to escape to Vegas for the weekend. Adam and Zack want to stay out of trouble. But it's not just another night in the life of these unusual characters.

programme.title: Clueless, (1995, Romance)
programme.desc: A US West Coast teen lifestyle parody centered around Cher, a popular high school girl who spends her days playing match-maker, helping her friends with fashion choices, and looking for a boyfriend.

programme.title: Home for the Holidays, (1995, Drama)
programme.desc: After losing her job, making out with her soon-to-be ex-boss, and finding out that her daughter plans to spend Thanksgiving with her boyfriend, Claudia Larson has to face spending the holiday with her family.

programme.title: Girl, Interrupted, (1999, Biographical Drama)
programme.desc: Winona Ryder and Academy Award(r)-winner Angelina Jolie are the certifiable stars of Claymoore Hospital's South Bell ward in this wry adaptation of Susanna Kaysen's best-selling memoir.

programme.title: Home for the Holidays, (1995, Drama)
programme.desc: After losing her job, making out with her soon-to-be ex-boss, and finding out that her daughter plans to spend Thanksgiving with her boyfriend, Claudia Larson has to face spending the holiday with her family.
